title: North Wind
description: Four men deep in the Canadian wilderness witness missiles flying away from the United States. Brice Anderson, a Colonel in the U.S. Army realizes what is about to happen and attempts to send an urgent warning to his wife, Sharon, telling her to run and where to head. With little to no indication that it transmitted or was ever received the men head out for the location 1200 miles away. Sharon, her close friend Sarah and their children are on the Anderson's pleasure craft on Lake Ontario when she receives the mysterious message. Her overwhelming love of family and friends, and her incredibly strong will to find her husband drives her on a desperate race against time up the St. Lawrence Seaway where she will face her ultimate challenge. You will run the gauntlet of emotions as you follow along with both groups until the surprising ending leaves you breathless and wanting more!
author: Michael    Hale
